title: Striking Thoughts: Bruce Lee's Wisdom for Daily Living
description:
Striking Thoughts: Bruce Lee's Wisdom for Daily Living (Bruce Lee Library)
by Bruce Lee, John Little

DESCRIPTION:

Within the pages of Striking Thoughts, you will find the secrets of Bruce Lee's amazing successÃ¢â‚¬â€ as an actor, martial artist, and inspiration to the world. Consisting of eight sections, Striking Thoughts covers 72 topics and 825 aphorismsÃ¢â‚¬â€from spirituality to personal liberation and from family life to film makingÃ¢â‚¬â€all of which Bruce lived by.

His ideas helped energize his life and career, and made it possible for him to live a happy and assured life, overcoming difficult obstacles with seeming ease. His ideas also inspired his family, friends, students, and colleagues to achieve success in their own lives and this personal collection will help you in your journey too.

Sections include:
On First PrinciplesÃ¢â‚¬â€including life, existence, time, and death
On Being HumanÃ¢â‚¬â€including the mind, happiness, fear, and dreams
On Matters of ExistenceÃ¢â‚¬â€health, love, marriage, raising children, ethics, racism, and adversity
On AchievementÃ¢â‚¬â€work, goals, faith, success, money, and fame
On Art and ArtistsÃ¢â‚¬â€art, filmmaking, and acting
On Personal LiberationÃ¢â‚¬â€conditioning, Zen Buddhism, meditation, and freedom
On the Process of BecomingÃ¢â‚¬â€self-actualization, self-help, self-expression, and growth
On Ultimate (Final) PrinciplesÃ¢â‚¬â€Yin-yang, totality, Tao, and the truth
"A teacher is never a giver of truthÃ¢â‚¬â€he is a guide, a pointer to the truth that each student must find for himself. A good teacher is merely a catalyst."Bruce Lee
